title: Sum of Two Numbers
description: Write a function that adds two numbers together.
instructions: Write a function that takes two numbers as input and returns their sum.

title: Multiply Two Numbers
description: Write a function that multiplies two numbers.
instructions: Write a function that takes two numbers as input and returns their product.

title: Find Largest Number
description: Write a function that returns the largest number between two numbers.
instructions: Write a function that takes two numbers as input and returns the largest.

title: Check if a Number is Even
description: Write a function that checks if a number is even.
instructions: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns True if it is even, otherwise False.

title: Check if a Number is Greater Than 10
description: Write a function that checks if a number is greater than 10.
instructions: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns True if it is greater than 10.

title: Square a Number
description: Write a function that returns the square of a number.
instructions: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns its square.

title: Sum of List
description: Write a function that returns the sum of all numbers in a list.
instructions: Write a function that takes a list as input and returns the sum of its elements.

title: Count Vowels
description: Write a function that counts the number of vowels in a string.
instructions: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns the number of vowels.

title: Reverse a List
description: Write a function that reverses a list.
instructions: Write a function that takes a list as input and returns the reversed list.

title: Convert to Uppercase
description: Write a function that converts a string to uppercase.
instructions: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns it in uppercase.

title: Check if a Number is Positive
description: Write a function that checks if a number is positive.
instructions: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns True if it is positive, otherwise False.

title: Find Smallest Number
description: Write a function that returns the smallest number between two numbers.
instructions: Write a function that takes two numbers as input and returns the smallest.

title: Convert to Lowercase
description: Write a function that converts a string to lowercase.
instructions: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns it in lowercase.

title: Calculate Area of a Rectangle
description: Write a function that calculates the area of a rectangle.
instructions: Write a function that takes the length and width of a rectangle as input and returns its area.

title: Find Remainder
description: Write a function that returns the remainder when one number is divided by another.
instructions: Write a function that takes two numbers as input and returns the remainder when the first is divided by the second.

title: Find Average of a List
description: Write a function that returns the average of a list of numbers.
instructions: Write a function that takes a list as input and returns its average.

title: Double the Number
description: Write a function that doubles a given number.
instructions: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns its double.

title: Convert Celsius to Fahrenheit
description: Write a function that converts Celsius to Fahrenheit.
instructions: Write a function that takes temperature in Celsius as input and returns it in Fahrenheit.

title: Count Words in a String
description: Write a function that counts the number of words in a string.
instructions: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns the number of words.

title: Convert Minutes to Seconds
description: Write a function that converts minutes to seconds.
instructions: Write a function that takes minutes as input and returns the equivalent in seconds.
